Ubuntu has held a <nowiki>[[UbuntuGlobalJam|Global Jam]]</nowiki> for the last few releases, and have scheduled one for the weekend of 2nd - 4th of September. We've participated in all of the previous ones, so we should do so this release cycle also!

=== Locations ===
* When: September 3, 2011 5:00PM - 7:00PM
* Where: <nowiki>[[http://http://www.cafelibertalia.com/|Cafe Libertalia]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-california/1198/detail/|Ubuntu Global Jam San Diego]]</nowiki>
* We will be working on <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Jams/Testing|Testing]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Jams/Upgrade|Upgrading]]</nowiki> From 11.04 to 11.10.
* Blog post from Philip Ballew: <nowiki>[[http://philipballew.wordpress.com/2011/09/04/ubuntu-global-jam-san-diego-wrap-up/|Ubuntu Global Jam San Diego wrap-up]]</nowiki>
